drawidha jathika sandhana nayaka,wipaksha nayaka aar.sambandhange samipa gnyathiyeku wana siwarasa(na kamata massina wana) namaththeku pasugiya 8 wanida kolambaa waraya haraha me ratata genwu meratata genwima thahanam kara athi adhi thakshanika sanniwedana upakarana sahitha kantenara pettiyak janapathige niyamayen mudaharimata katayuthu kara thibena bawa apa arakshaka thorathuru warthakaru anawaranaya kala.pasugiya 8 wanida kolambaa waraya haraha pamini mema thahanam badu thogaya sahitha kantenaraya paliyagoda bahalum anganaye reguwa baraye radawagena thibuna athara pasuwa ee sambandhayen aarakshaka amathyanshayata danuwath kirimata katayuthu kara thibe.

puththalam disthrik parlimenthu manthri wiktar antani biyanwala mahathage pradhanathwayen, mema karya sidukerini.mawuwarun siyayakata aasanna sankhyawakata me sayanaya magin setha salasena athara, laksha 30k watinakamin yuthu me godanangilla sandaha mulyamaya dayakathwaya sapaya thibune warld wishan lanka kalpitiya sanwardhana wadasatahana magini.kalpitiya sahakara pradeshiya lekam rangana pranandu, kalpitiya saukhya waidya niladhari em. es. fawus, kalpitiya disthrik waidya niladhari em. ech. em. fayis, kalawila misam palana luk nelsan piyathuma athulu pirisak da me awasthawata sahabhagi wuha.  .

swabhawika saundaryayen piripun galu purawaraye sundarathwaya menma galu nagarayata paminena des wides janathawage awashyathawayanda nisi paridden itu wanne nagarika sanwardhanaye diyunuwath samanga nam ema rate pragamanaya yawathkalina wanu atha.thirasara nagarika sanwardhanayak udesa mahinda chinthana idiri dakma anuwa galu nagaraya sancharaka aakarshanaya dinagath nagarayak lesa sanwardhanaya kirime pulul wadapiliwela anuwa galu nagara sanwardhanaye thawath wadagath sanwardhana wyapruthiyak lesa idikirim awasan kara athi galu kotuwe iparani landesi rohala supiri welenda sankirnaya ada dina janadhipathithumage pradhanathwayen janatha ayithiyata pathkirimata niyamithayi.loka urumayak bawata pathwu mema godanangille athi wasthu widyathmaka lakshana ha pauranikathwayata kisidu haniyak nowana ayurin janatha aakarshaniya sthanayak lesa haritha nagara sankalpaya yatathe parisarika samathulithathawaya uparima lesa aaraksha wana ayurin haritha udyanayada samangin prathisanskaranaya kirimata nagarika sanwardhana adhikariyata haki wiya.mema nirmanashili wyapruthiya janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage sankalpayak anuwa rajya aarakshaka ha nagarika sanwardhana amathyanshaye lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathage upades matha ha ethumage purna adhikshanaya yatathe nagarika sanwardhana adhikariya wisin supiri sappu sankirnayak bawata path kara atha.yuddhayen pasu athiwu samakami wathawaranaya thula merata nagarika sanwardhanaye nawa parichchedayak aarambha wiya.
